CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The higher mobilities and more balanced charge transport should definitely favor the charge transportation in the blend film and lead to high solar cell performance , supporting the b e n e fi c i a l e ff e c t o f t h e t h e r m a l a n n e a l i n g o n PCDSeBT : PC71BM cells .

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDSeBT - This is a "Material Name" entity. It is a type of organic semiconductor material that is often used in organic solar cells.
2. PC71BM - This is another "Material Name" entity. It is a fullerene derivative that is commonly used as an electron transport layer in organic solar cells.

Therefore, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are PCDSeBT and PC71BM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PCDSeBT
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names. The other entities such as "blend film", "charge transportation", "solar cell performance", and "thermal annealing" are not Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The higher mobilities and more balanced charge transport should definitely favor the charge transportation in the blend film and lead to high solar cell performance , supporting the b e n e fi c i a l e ff e c t o f t h e t h e r m a l a n n e a l i n g o n PCDSeBT : PC71BM cells .

Let's think step by step.

1. "high solar cell performance" - This is the first "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the level of efficiency or effectiveness of the solar cells.

2. "the beneficial effect" - This is the second "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the positive impact or advantage of a certain process or treatment.

3. "high" - This is the third "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It refers to a level or degree of a certain property or characteristic.

Note: "Property Value" entities refer to specific levels or degrees of properties or characteristics that are being described or evaluated. In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entities are used to describe the performance of solar cells and the impact of a certain treatment.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "high solar cell performance" - This is the relevant "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the level of efficiency or effectiveness of the solar cells.

Note: I have removed the other two "Property Value" entities as they do not clearly refer to the value of a material property. "The beneficial effect" is a general term that could refer to any kind of advantage or impact, and "high" is a modifier that could be applied to any property or characteristic. In contrast, "high solar cell performance" specifically refers to the level of efficiency or effectiveness of solar cells, which is a material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high solar cell performance |
